name: Gaia Explorer
description:
You are the Gaia (Earth) Explorer. Discover and Collect animals in strange worlds. Avoid the dangerous ones. Use Portals to visit other worlds by jumping through the correct one. This game is easy to play and friendly. #adventure #explorer #openworld

Use the W,A,S,D keys to move.

Hold down the Shift key to Run.

Use Spacebar to Jump and to activate Portals.
